body.p:
Smithland April 28th ^1864^
Gov Bramlette
Dear Sir

Enclosed Please find a coppy of several indightments against me & others for having it is said violated the Laws of Ky in obeying Milaterry orders as Judges of the Election on the 3rd of Aug last, also please find a letter form Capt Baker & endorsed by Several Miletary Gentlemen, which I hope will be favourably considered for we all thought we were doing our duty as strictly Loyal men according to our instructions

your obt Servt
P, H, Corant
